segments.text: My gaze shifts to the other side of the kitchen, and another scene unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is attempting to reach something in an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, two-step stool, which looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the legs of the stool are splayed out, almost as if it's about to topple backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That's extremely dangerous; he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is reaching into a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR," obviously trying to get some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, looking up expectantly, clearly a co-conspirator in this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite daring of them to do this right behind the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't noticed their antics yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is filled with potential peril for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR
